name: ThisDayinStockMarketHistory-BeginToInvest
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The importance of understanding stock market history is pivotal to becoming a better investor. Charlie Munger, Ben Graham, Burton Malkiel, and Jim Rogers have all spoken on the importance of knowing history as a key to their success investing. 
 
With this flash briefing, you will get quick, daily 1 - 2 minute briefs on important events that occurred this day in history. 
Simply add this skill and ask; "Alexa what is my flash briefing?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
